name: Horizon Janitorial Services, Inc.
description: Horizon Janitorial Services, Inc. is a leading provider of commercial cleaning and facility maintenance solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional service and sustainable practices. Founded in 2010, the company has established a strong reputation for its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Horizon Janitorial Services offers a comprehensive range of services, including daily office cleaning, carpet and upholstery care, window washing, and specialized sanitation services. The company prides itself on using eco-friendly cleaning products and innovative techniques that minimize environmental impact while ensuring a clean and healthy workspace. With a team of highly trained professionals and a customer-centric approach, Horizon Janitorial Services partners with businesses of all sizes to tailor cleaning solutions that meet their unique needs. The company's mission is to enhance the working environment for its clients through reliable and efficient services, fostering a culture of cleanliness that boosts productivity and employee well-being.
